name: gear-up
flavor_text: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
effect_text_extend: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
effect_text_simple: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
